description: Handles detection of pattern shifts and transitions between TYPEs (e.g. from TYPE_1 to TYPE_2)

logic.description: Detects when a Balanced Pairing loop ends and transitions into a Cutpoint-1 (e.g. BBPP → BPP → BPP)

trigger.current_sequence_shape: Pattern where streak ≥ 2 followed by 1 of opposite
trigger.repetition: At least 2 consecutive patterns like PPB, BBP

logic.explanation: Initial Balanced Pairing (e.g. BBPP) transitions into a Cutpoint-1 cycle (PPB, PPB, ...), signaling a pattern shift.

logic.description: Detects when a longer Balanced Pairing loop (e.g. 1.4) shifts into a shorter subtype (e.g. 1.2 or 1.1)
logic.explanation: Momentum decays into shorter but similar subtype structures. Important for controlling prediction force.
